content.question: In the lines (“Men do not . . . the kitchen”), the author

choices.label: stresses the importance of all household business
evaluates contrasting perspectives on gender and work
questions the onerous nature of the work men pursue
supports a claim by comparing work-related activities

content.answer: supports a claim by comparing work-related activities

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
